content:
The head of Kharkiv Ova Oleg Synigubov said that as a result of the hostile shelling of the village of Borova, there are already 7 victims, including three minor boys.

About this head of the areawroteIn his Telegram channel.

In addition, a civilian 70-year-old resident was killed as a result of a hostile attack. The circumstances are clarified.

“A 73-year-old civilian with debris injuries. A 44-year-old woman has suffered moderate injuries. A 24-year-old woman has an acute response to stress.

Three young men aged 12 to 16 years of injury to a mild and medium character. The 18-year-old guy was injured, ”the message reads.

All the victims are now being provided. Rescuers continue to eliminate the effects of the attack.

Earlier, the head of Ova reported that as a result of impact in Kharkiv regiondiedThe pensioner and three children were injured.
title: The number of victims in Kharkiv region through the shelling of the Russian Federation increased to seven people
description: The head of the region wrote about it in his Telegram channel. In addition, as a result of ...
author: Army Inform
